title: Consistently Low FPS In Last 6 Months
body:
Hello community,

For the past 4-5 months now I have been battling consistently low fps in game where I used to get a steady 120 or so... With all the same setting I am getting about 35 now for the beginning parts of the game when it is 1v1 in lane / small ganks. When a teamfight happens I am very frequently dropping to 4 fps exactly until the reamainder of the fight. This low fps sometimes holds through the death timer and goes back to 35-40 when I respawn.

My system information is as follows:

Model: Alienware Laptop 17 (purchased in 2014)
Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4700MQ CPU @ 2.40GHz   2.40GHz
Installed memory (RAM): 16.0 GB (15.9 GB usable)
System type: 64-bit Operating System, x64-based processor
Windows 10 OS

I do not know much about computers but I do know these specs should be running the game fine as it has for the last 3 years. Please comment for advice/help as I know I am not the first person to have this issue. I desperately need some help.

Thank you in advance Summoners.

replies.body:
Greetings B1gMik3,

This problem sounds like it could be linked to your laptop over heating, graphics drivers not up to date, software issues or other things that could be possibily effecting it.

Riot did a list of these common things and more with instructions on how to fix them. What I would recommend you do is go through this list and complete each one to see if it fixes your issue:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684

I hope that this helps. Let me know if completing the things on this list works. If you are still experiencing issues after the list there are other things we can try as well to fix this issue.

~Elam
